factNum1.title: Restore deleted mails.
factNum1.text: Don’t worry, you can recover your deleted mail up until 30 days.

factNum2.title: Single-use procedure.
factNum2.text: We aim for optimal outcomes, ensuring that you won't have to repeat the process multiple times

factNum3.title: Quick and efficient.
factNum3.text: Simply grant us access to your mail, and then sit back and relax while we handle the cleaning for you.

loadingPage.title: Loading your data...
loadingPage.subTitle: this might take a few minuets.

remembersList.rem1: ☝🏻 You won't lose emails from private senders.
remembersList.rem2: 🔄 You can rejoin lists in case you regret.
remembersList.rem3: 🧘‍♀️ An empty mailbox reduces digital stress.
